content:
As an AI language model, I do not possess any personal opinion; however, it's possible that Boxed's supply chain management approach gives them a strategic advantage over other retailers.

Since Boxed focuses on selling bulk items, inventory management is a critical aspect of their business model. By utilizing sophisticated demand forecasting techniques and inventory optimization tools, they can minimize stockouts while also reducing the amount of inventory they need to hold, which can ultimately increase their profitability.

In addition, Boxed's online-only approach may give them more flexibility in their supply chain management practices, making it easier for them to adapt to changes in demand or optimize their sourcing and logistics.

Overall, Boxed's supply chain management practices are likely key factors in their ability to offer competitive pricing and fast delivery times to their customers. By keeping their inventory optimized and operating a lean supply chain, they can offer bulk products at lower prices than their competitors while still maintaining a high level of service.
